articles.title: Zynga launches voice game Words With Friends Word Pop for Amazon Alexa - VentureBeat
articles.description: Zynga has launched Words With Friends Word Pop as a new voice game for Amazon Alexa. It's part of Zynga's experiment with new kinds of games.
